DOC.brief_summary: Improved pain , sexuality quality life , high fertility low complication recurrence rate multidisciplinary CO2 laser laparoscopic excision deep infiltrating colorectal endometriosis .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome After Multidisciplinary CO2 Laser Laparoscopic Excision Deep Infiltrating Colorectal Endometriosis
DOC.detailed_description: All woman ( n=56 ) undergone CO2 laser laparoscopic radical excision deep infiltrating endometriosis active involvement colorectal surgeon and/or urologist select retrospectively list patient ( n=more 2000 ) operate Leuven University Fertility Centre ( LUFc ) September 1996 July 2004 . All 56 multidisciplinary operate patient ask complete Oxford Endometriosis Quality Life questionnaire , sexual activity questionnaire visual analogue scale ( VAS ) dysmenorroe , chronic pelvic pain deep dyspareunia , compare status surgery moment evaluation ( January 2005 ) .
